breakdowns.header: Integrate Chainlink Functions for Secure Off-Chain Data Processing
breakdowns.description: Enables the system to securely execute off-chain data operations, deterministically fetch or compute external data, encode the results, and return them to a smart contract. The results are then stored and made accessible on-chain.
conditions: Off-chain data must be executed securely.
External data fetching or computation must be deterministic.
Results must be encoded and returned to a smart contract.
Results must be stored and exposed on-chain.

breakdowns.description: Allows the smart contract to mint a token once the required data has been obtained and is available on-chain.
conditions: Token minting occurs only after data is available on-chain.
